name: marabesi.com
description: This is the source code of my personal website where you can find at [marabesi.com](http://marabesi.com)

scripts.build: npm run build:tailwind && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.watch: npm run build:tailwind && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental --config _config.yml,_config_local.yml
scripts.watch-drafts: npm run build:tailwind && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental --drafts --config _config.yml,_config_local.yml
scripts.serve: npm run build:tailwind && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_local.yml && http-server -p 4000 ./_site
